Original:
我們在這個酒吧度過了一段美好的時光，調酒師非常友好，非常有才華，所有三種不同的雞尾酒都很美味，而且非常特別。酒吧有點難找，因為你必須穿過餐廳然後下樓，而且外面沒有任何標誌。
儘管如此，如果您想與朋友度過一個舒適的夜晚，我真的很推薦這個酒吧！室內設計也很棒－總而言之5顆星！
EN:
We spent a good time in this bar. The bartender is very friendly and very talented. All three different cocktails are delicious and very special.The bar is a bit difficult to find, because you must pass through the restaurant and go downstairs, and there are no signs outside.
Nevertheless, if you want to spend a comfortable night with your friends, I really recommend this bar!The interior design is also great -5 stars!
